@yomadic Yeah it was a Polish city between the wars, lots of historic connections. Austro-Hungarian before that. Has had interesting history
@jadecraven I did think that might be the case. Makes me feel old tho.
@yomadic I was (by accident) there on a Polish long weekend and it was full on. Glad when we got to Monday and they'd all headed home.
